Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Croatia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Croatia
    Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Jan. 25 sent a congratulatory message to Stipe Mesic upon his reelection as president of Croatia.
 In the belief that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would continue to develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished the president of Croatia fresh success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country.
